description.value:
You exhale tendrils formed from flakes of rusted metal. All creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] take @Damage[4d10[slashing]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A metal creature that fails its save also takes @Damage[2d4[persistent,slashing]] damage.

Heightened (+2) The cloud's slashing damage increases by 1d10 and the persistent damage increases by [[/r 1d4]].
